long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Jumia Shopping Experience with the Quick View for Jumia Productivity Extension!

Are you an avid shopper on Jumia looking to make informed purchasing decisions faster and more efficiently? The Quick View extension is designed just for you! This powerful tool provides instant, detailed insights into product listings directly on Jumia, so you can easily compare features and make smarter choices without having to leave the page.

Key Features:

* Instant Product Overview: Hover over any product image to see a quick preview of essential details including key features, what's in the box, specifications, and seller information.

* Effortless Navigation: View detailed product information and seller performance ratings in a user-friendly popup that appears right next to the item you're interested in.

* Customizable Popup Activation: Choose to activate the popup with a simple hover or hold down the CTRL (CMD) key for enhanced flexibility based on your browsing preferences.

* Seamless Integration: The extension integrates smoothly with Jumia's interface, ensuring that your shopping experience remains streamlined and uninterrupted.

* Toggle Extension On/Off: Easily switch the extension on or off using a convenient toggle in the toolbar, and manage your preferences with a sleek settings interface.

!!! Works on all major Jumia international marketplaces, namely:      
Algeria
Ivory Coast
Egypt
Ghana
Morocco
Nigeria
Senegal
Tunisia
Uganda
Zando

How to Use the Quick View Extension on Jumia:

Get the most out of your Jumia shopping experience with these simple steps:

+ Install the Extension

Begin by adding the Quick View extension to your browser from the Chrome Web Store. It’s quick and easy !

Once installed, the extension seamlessly integrates into your Jumia browsing experience. There’s no need for extra setup—just start shopping!

+ Hover Over Product Images

As you browse Jumia’s product listings, hover over any product image to instantly view a comprehensive Quick View popup. This feature displays essential product details without having to leave the page. Additionaly, activate the popup with a simple hover or hold down the CTRL (CMD) key to view detailed product insights based on your preference. This flexibility helps you tailor your shopping experience.

The PL Quick View extension is your perfect companion for a smarter, more efficient shopping experience on Jumia.
